mapper.select: select count(0) from tb_order_repay where order_id = #{orderId} and repay_status=1
select repay_no,uid,order_id from tb_order_repay where repay_status = 1 and create_time <= date_format(date_sub(now(), interval 2 minute ), '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s');
select repay_no from tb_order_repay where order_id = #{order_id} order by repay_no desc limit 1;

SELECT tory.repay_no, tory.uid, tory.order_id FROM tb_order_repay tory INNER JOIN tb_order tor ON tory.order_id = tor.id INNER JOIN tb_merchant tmt ON tor.merchant = tmt.merchant_alias WHERE tory.repay_status = 1 AND tor.`status` >= 31 AND tor.`status` < 41 AND tmt.bind_type = 5 AND tory.create_time <= date_format( date_sub(now(), INTERVAL 10 MINUTE), '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s' )
